root.name: Tropico 4 Collector's Bundle
root.description:
Tropico 4: Collectors Bundle combines all the latest Tropico 4:
* Tropico 4 * Tropico 4 Expansion: Modern Times * Tropico 4: DLC1 Junta * Tropico 4: DLC2 Plantador * Tropico 4: DLC3 Quick-Dry-Cement * Tropico 4: DLC4 Pirate Heaven * Tropico 4: DLC5 Megalopolis * Tropico 4: DLC6 Vigilante
